name: Small Model - Zero Shot Prompt
prompt:
Above is a BPMN 2.0 choreography. Generate a solidity smart contract from this.
Name the contract by the choreography ID.
The contract must implement the function "enact(uint taskID)", which lets a participant execute a task.
The function enforces the order of tasks. 
Extract the rules based on the flow given in the diagram. Only tasks are executed by participants, gateways are evaluated by the smart contract autonomously.
The different taskIDs for the function must equal the ones from the model as follows:
{"ChoreographyTask_0hy9n0g":1,"ChoreographyTask_1b2vkz9":2,"ChoreographyTask_1jrfmx8":3,"ChoreographyTask_1797ws1":4}

Outgoing flows from an exclusiveGateway which are not the default flow, need to enforce a condition.
The conditions are present in the model as "conditionExpression". Enforce them based on the flow given in the diagram.
The contracts needs a function "setconditions(uint _conditions)".

Also, enforce the correct initiator (initiatingParticipantRef) of a task by comparing the address.
Participants' addresses are set in the constructor "constructor(address[n] memory _participants)", 
where n stands for the number of participants. You must encode them like follows: 
{"Participant_06qakjv":0,"Participant_0mgz9si":1,"Participant_0537iz2":2}

The current state (or marking) of the contract must be encoded in the "tokenState" variable.
If the end of the contract is reached, set tokenState to 0.
Just output the smart contract, do not output additional, redundant text. In case of 
problems write "ERROR" followed by a precise diagnosis of the problem.

Start writing the smart contract:
input:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<definitions id="_tTv5YOycEeiHGOQ2NkJZNQ" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn">
  <message id="Message_0cxtsts"></message>
  <message id="Message_11aqot7"></message>
  <message id="Message_1n1tjfo"></message>
  <message id="Message_1pam53q" name="pizza orde"></message>
  <choreography id="PizzaDelivery">
    <participant id="Participant_06qakjv" name="Customer"></participant>
    <participant id="Participant_0mgz9si" name="Pizza Place"></participant>
    <participant id="Participant_0537iz2" name="Delivery Boy"></participant>
    <messageFlow id="MessageFlow_0qo1upk" sourceRef="Participant_0537iz2" targetRef="Participant_06qakjv" messageRef="Message_0cxtsts"></messageFlow>
    <messageFlow id="MessageFlow_12ydots" sourceRef="Participant_0mgz9si" targetRef="Participant_06qakjv" messageRef="Message_11aqot7"></messageFlow>
    <messageFlow id="MessageFlow_0tfwexj" sourceRef="Participant_0mgz9si" targetRef="Participant_06qakjv" messageRef="Message_1n1tjfo"></messageFlow>
    <messageFlow id="MessageFlow_0nzo41l" sourceRef="Participant_06qakjv" targetRef="Participant_0mgz9si" messageRef="Message_1pam53q"></messageFlow>
    <startEvent id="StartEvent_00yy9i8">
      <outgoing>SequenceFlow_0dy5er9</outgoing>
    </startEvent>
    <choreographyTask id="ChoreographyTask_0hy9n0g" name="Order Pizza" initiatingParticipantRef="Participant_06qakjv">
      <incoming>SequenceFlow_0dy5er9</incoming>
      <outgoing>SequenceFlow_036yo13</outgoing>
      <participantRef>Participant_06qakjv</participantRef>
      <participantRef>Participant_0mgz9si</participantRef>
      <messageFlowRef>MessageFlow_0nzo41l</messageFlowRef>
    </choreographyTask>
    <choreographyTask id="ChoreographyTask_1b2vkz9" name="Confirm ETA" initiatingParticipantRef="Participant_0mgz9si">
      <incoming>Flow_1uhdzct</incoming>
      <outgoing>Flow_0y1kbgm</outgoing>
      <participantRef>Participant_0mgz9si</participantRef>
      <participantRef>Participant_06qakjv</participantRef>
      <messageFlowRef>MessageFlow_0tfwexj</messageFlowRef>
    </choreographyTask>
    <choreographyTask id="ChoreographyTask_1jrfmx8" name="Announce Delivery" initiatingParticipantRef="Participant_0mgz9si">
      <incoming>Flow_0y1kbgm</incoming>
      <outgoing>Flow_1mu041j</outgoing>
      <participantRef>Participant_0mgz9si</participantRef>
      <participantRef>Participant_06qakjv</participantRef>
      <messageFlowRef>MessageFlow_12ydots</messageFlowRef>
    </choreographyTask>
    <choreographyTask id="ChoreographyTask_1797ws1" name="Deliver Pizza" initiatingParticipantRef="Participant_0537iz2">
      <incoming>Flow_16j5p8v</incoming>
      <outgoing>Flow_0p1us2t</outgoing>
      <participantRef>Participant_0537iz2</participantRef>
      <participantRef>Participant_06qakjv</participantRef>
      <messageFlowRef>MessageFlow_0qo1upk</messageFlowRef>
    </choreographyTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="SequenceFlow_0dy5er9" sourceRef="StartEvent_00yy9i8" targetRef="ChoreographyTask_0hy9n0g"></sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="SequenceFlow_036yo13" sourceRef="ChoreographyTask_0hy9n0g" targetRef="Gateway_1td68h3"></sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="Flow_0mkbrl0" name="pizza ready" sourceRef="Gateway_1td68h3" targetRef="Gateway_0x44u2n">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn2:tFormalExpression" language="Solidity">conditions & 1 == 1</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="Flow_1uhdzct" name="Pizza needs to be baked" sourceRef="Gateway_1td68h3" targetRef="ChoreographyTask_1b2vkz9"></sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="Flow_16j5p8v" sourceRef="Gateway_0x44u2n" targetRef="ChoreographyTask_1797ws1"></sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="Flow_0y1kbgm" sourceRef="ChoreographyTask_1b2vkz9" targetRef="ChoreographyTask_1jrfmx8"></sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="Flow_1mu041j" sourceRef="ChoreographyTask_1jrfmx8" targetRef="Gateway_0x44u2n"></sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="Flow_0p1us2t" sourceRef="ChoreographyTask_1797ws1" targetRef="EndEvent_1lv264w"></sequenceFlow>
    <endEvent id="EndEvent_1lv264w">
      <incoming>Flow_0p1us2t</incoming>
    </endEvent>
    <exclusiveGateway id="Gateway_1td68h3" default="Flow_1uhdzct">
      <incoming>SequenceFlow_036yo13</incoming>
      <outgoing>Flow_0mkbrl0</outgoing>
      <outgoing>Flow_1uhdzct</outgoing>
    </exclusiveGateway>
    <exclusiveGateway id="Gateway_0x44u2n" default="Flow_16j5p8v">
      <incoming>Flow_1mu041j</incoming>
      <incoming>Flow_0mkbrl0</incoming>
      <outgoing>Flow_16j5p8v</outgoing>
    </exclusiveGateway>
  </choreography>
</definitions>
